actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for special immigrant status for certain aliens popularly known as "Silva Class Members", and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide special immigrant status for certain Western Hemisphere resident aliens ("Silva class") issued immigrant visa priority dates between June 30, 1968, and January 1, 1977. Waives specified grounds for exclusion. Permits such aliens to adjust to permanent resident status.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for special immigrant status for certain aliens popularly known as "Silva Class Members", and for other purposes.
